metadata.title: CVE-2024-35904 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:selinux: avoid dereference of garbage after mount failureIn case kern_mount() fails and returns an error pointer return in theerror branch instead of continuing and dereferencing the error pointer.While on it drop the never read static variable selinuxfs_mount.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
